item.title: About
item.description: Libertas is a generative artist. ¶ Inspired by everything from psychological to physical worlds, Liberats creates algorithm to generate arts that empower the community. She utilizes every possible AI technique during the process, including VQGAN+CLIP, CLIP Guided diffusion, Jukebox, etc.

item.title: Libertas Roadmap
item.description: Phase One ¶ We will launch three projects initially to tell our stories and share our perspectives of the world ¶ Launch of Spectrum series, Date April 6th, 2022 Launch of Space War Series, Date May 18th, 2022 Launch of Chinese Style Painting series, Date TBC Launch of Kooning series, Date TBC During this phase ¶ 20% profit from public sales will be saved and contributed to the Libertas Fund, which will be used by the community in the future.
